text: Sharon Petzold (born 10 October 1971) is an American freestyle skier. She competed at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1991 in Lake Placid, where she placed fifteenth in acroski (ski ballet). She won a silver medal in ski ballet at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1993 in Altenmarkt- Zauchensee. She took part at the 1992 Winter Olympics in Albertville, where ski ballet was a demonstration event. == References == == External links == * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American female freestyle skiers
title: Sharon Petzold
